title: Coronavirus scare cripples Himachal’s tourism sector, hotels, homestays, eateries record sharp decline in footfall
description: In Kinnaur, the district hotel association has resolved to deny occupancy to all foreign nationals.
content: In Spiti valley residents have unanimously resolved to close all hotels and homestays while checkpoints have been set up at entry points to the valley for screening visitors Photo Amit Chakravarty Tourism in Himachal Pradesh one of the state s key indus chars
